return.description:
Returns an array with the current session cookie information, the array
   contains the following items:
   
    
     
      "lifetime" -  The
      lifetime of the cookie in seconds.
     
    
    
     
      "path" -  The path where
      information is stored.
     
    
    
     
      "domain" -  The domain
      of the cookie.
     
    
    
     
      "secure" -  The cookie
      should only be sent over secure connections.
     
    
    
     
      "httponly" - The
      cookie can only be accessed through the HTTP protocol.

changelog.change: The "httponly" entry was added in the returned array.
The "secure" entry was added in the returned array.
